author: Paulo Coelho
text: Relax. You can’t save someone from themselves

author: Ray Dalio
text: Pain + Reflection = Progress

author: Tochukwu
text: If you lack discipline, you'll become the big talking mediocre

author: Margaret Thatcher
text: No one would remember the Good Samaritan if he’d only had good intentions; he had money, too

author: Abraham Lincoln
text: That some achieve great success, is proof to all that others can achieve it as well

author: Helen Keller
text: Your success and happiness lie in you

author: Ming-Dao Deng
text: Life is a constant series of opportunities

author: Richard Bach
text: A tiny change today brings a dramatically different tomorrow

author: Carla Gordon
text: If someone in your life talked to you the way you talk to yourself, you would have left them long ago

author: Winston Churchill
text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts

author: Bo Bennett
text: Success is not in what you have, but who you are

author: Vidal Sassoon
text: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary

author: Albert Schweitzer
text: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful

author: Henry David Thoreau
text: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it

author: Zig Ziglar
text: Success is not about the destination, it's about the journey

author: Winston Churchill
text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm

author: Colin R. Davis
text: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same
Success is not just about making money. It's about making a difference

author: Maya Angelou
text: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it

author: Richard Branson
text: Business opportunities are like buses, there's always another one coming

author: Sheryl Sandberg
text: If you're offered a seat on a rocket ship, don't ask what seat! Just get on

author: Warren Buffett
text: It's far better to buy a wonderful company at a fair price than a fair company at a wonderful price

author: Oprah Winfrey
text: Think like a queen. A queen is not afraid to fail. Failure is another stepping stone to greatness

author: Mary Kay Ash
text: Aerodynamically, the bumblebee shouldn't be able to fly, but the bumblebee doesn't know it, so it goes on flying anyway

author: Mark Cuban
text: It doesn't matter how many times you fail. You only have to be right once, and then everyone can tell you that you are an overnight success

author: Sara Blakely
text: It's important to be willing to make mistakes. The worst thing that can happen is you become memorable

author: Meg Whitman
text: Risk more than others think is safe. Dream more than others think is practical

author: Ginni Rometty
text: Growth and comfort do not coexist

author: John Lennon
text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans

author: Abraham Lincoln
text: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years

author: Helen Keller
text: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all

author: Charles R. Swindoll
text: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it

author: Sarah Louise Delany
text: Life is short, and it is up to you to make it sweet

author: Sholom Aleichem
text: Life is a dream for the wise, a game for the fool, a comedy for the rich, a tragedy for the poor

author: Oliver Goldsmith
text: Life is a journey that must be traveled no matter how bad the roads and accommodations

author: Victor Hugo
text: Life is a flower of which love is the honey

author: Albert Einstein
text: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving

author: Tony Robbins
text: Life is a gift, and it offers us the privilege, opportunity, and responsibility to give something back by becoming more

author: Oscar Wilde
text: Life is too important to be taken seriously

author: Grandma Moses
text: Life is what we make it, always has been, always will be

author: Positive Affirmation
text: I am capable of achieving my goals and dreams

author: Positive Affirmation
text: I am worthy of love, happiness, and success

author: Positive Affirmation
text: I embrace change as an opportunity for growth

author: Positive Affirmation
text: I am grateful for the abundance in my life

author: Positive Affirmation
text: I choose to focus on the present moment and let go of past regrets

author: Positive Affirmation
text: I radiate positivity and attract positive people into my life

author: Positive Affirmation
text: I am in control of my thoughts and emotions

author: Positive Affirmation
text: I am resilient and can overcome any challenge

author: Positive Affirmation
text: I am surrounded by opportunities for success and happiness

author: Positive Affirmation
text: I am constantly growing and evolving as a person

author: Positive Affirmation
text: I am worthy of all the good things that come into my life

author: Positive Affirmation
text: I am confident in my abilities and decisions

author: Positive Affirmation
text: I deserve to be happy and fulfilled

author: Positive Affirmation
text: I am at peace with my past and excited for my future

author: Positive Affirmation
text: I am open to new experiences and opportunities

author: Positive Affirmation
text: I am kind, loving, and deserving of love

author: Positive Affirmation
text: I am grateful for the lessons I've learned in life

author: Positive Affirmation
text: I am resilient and can handle life's challenges with grace

author: Positive Affirmation
text: I am in complete control of my own happiness

author: Positive Affirmation
text: I radiate confidence, grace, and charm

author: Positive Affirmation
text: I am open to the beauty and joy of each new day

author: Positive Affirmation
text: I forgive myself and others, and I am free to move forward

author: Positive Affirmation
text: I trust the journey of my life and believe in its purpose

author: Positive Affirmation
text: I am empowered to create the life I desire

author: Positive Affirmation
text: I am at peace with my past and excited about my future

author: Positive Affirmation
text: I am worthy of all the good that comes into my life

author: Positive Affirmation
text: I choose love, joy, and happiness every day

author: Positive Affirmation
text: I am grateful for the beauty in the world and in my life

author: Positive Affirmation
text: I trust myself and my intuition to guide me

author: Positive Affirmation
text: I am in the process of becoming the best version of myself

author: Positive Affirmation
text: I am the author of my own story, and it's a beautiful one

author: Peter Drucker
text: The best way to predict the future is to create it

author: Steve Jobs
text: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work

author: Warren Buffett
text: In the business world, the rearview mirror is always clearer than the windshield

author: Bill Gates
text: Your most unhappy customers are your greatest source of learning

author: Richard Branson
text: The best businesses come from thinking about things in a different way and seeing where you can make a difference

author: Jeff Bezos
text: Your brand is what other people say about you when you're not in the room

author: Chris Grosser
text: Opportunities don't happen. You create them

author: John D. Rockefeller
text: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great

author: Walt Disney
text: The best way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing

author: Theodore Roosevelt
text: The most important single ingredient in the formula of success is knowing how to get along with people

author: Jordan Belfort
text: The only thing standing between you and your goal is the story you keep telling yourself as to why you can't achieve it

author: Steve Jobs
text: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life

author: Thomas Jefferson
text: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have

author: Warren Buffett
text: The best investment you can make is in yourself

author: Richard Branson
text: Do not be embarrassed by your failures, learn from them and start again

author: Bill Gates
text: It's fine to celebrate success, but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure

author: Les Brown
text: The only limits to the possibilities in your life tomorrow are the buts you use today

author: Wealth Inc
text: Psychology says, the way you speak to yourself matters the most

author: Albert Einstein
text: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things

author: F. Matthias Alexander
text: People do not decide their futures, they decide their habits and their habits decide their futures
Continuous improvement is better than delayed perfection

author: Positive Affirmation
text: I'm comfortable in my own skin and am not afraid to express my personality

author: Mark Twain
text: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why

author: Mark Twain
text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started

author: Mark Twain
text: Wrinkles should merely indicate where smiles have been

author: Albert Einstein
text: Imagination is more important than knowledge. For knowledge is limited, whereas imagination embraces the entire world, stimulating progress, giving birth to evolution

author: Albert Einstein
text: Try not to become a man of success, but rather try to become a man of value

author: Albert Einstein
text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity

author: Albert Einstein
text: The difference between genius and stupidity is that genius has its limits

author: Albert Einstein
text: Logic will get you from A to B. Imagination will take you everywhere
Compete on value, not price
People buy with emotion, then justify with logic

author: Dave Ramsey
text: You must gain control over your money or the lack of it will forever control you

author: Dave Ramsey
text: Those who don’t manage their money will always work for those who do

author: Dave Ramsey
text: Change is painful. Few people have the courage to seek out change. Most people won’t change until the pain of where they are exceeds the pain of change

author: Dave Ramsey
text: Pray like it all depends on God, but work like it all depends on you

author: Seth Godin
text: Instead of wondering when your next vacation is, maybe you should set up a life you don't need to escape from

author: Seth Godin
text: Anxiety is experiencing failure in advance

author: Jordan B. Peterson
text: Act like the person you want to become

author: Elena Cardone
text: If you need something to believe in, start with yourself

author: Elena Cardone
text: Life is so short. There's no reason not to go after your dreams
